raw_body: GOONETILLEKE – PADMA,​ (Retired English trained teacher of Devi Balika,​ Anula Vidyalaya,​ Musaeus College and Lyceum Nugegoda). Beloved wife of Daya (Late),​ loving mother of Deepthi,​ Nalaka,​ Siromi,​ Lanka,​ Sanjaya and Amal,​ sister of Thilaka (late),​ Nita (late),​ Nandani (late),​ Lal (late),​ Ranjith,​ Nethaji and Lohitha,​ sister-in-law of Lalani,​ Chintha and Cynthia,​ mother-in-law of Sanjeewa,​ Rajiv and Tamara,​ grandmother of Pulsara,​ Rashmi,​ Lohan and Ethan. Remains at Jayaratne. Cremation at General Cemetery,​ Borella at 4 p.m. on 7th May 2024.         030365
